base_description: Gray aviator sunglasses with side shields.
part_description: Two gray lenses, silver frame, side shields, and temples. Lenses are oval, side shields are rectangular, and temples are straight.
internal_interaction_description: The lenses are securely held by the silver frame, which connects to the temples through hinges. The side shields are attached to the sides of the frame, providing additional coverage and support. The temples extend from the frame, ensuring a snug fit over the ears.
external_interaction_description: These sunglasses protect eyes from sunlight and glare. The side shields offer extra protection from peripheral light. They can be worn comfortably by individuals during outdoor activities, enhancing visual comfort and reducing eye strain.
